article_title: A Christmas Day Look At Santa's Tax Bill

article_metadata.author: Kelly Phillips Erb

og.description: It's Christmas Day! Santa had a big day on yesterday... with only a few days left in the calendar year, he has to be thinking about taxes. What does his tax picture look like in 2014?
og.title: A Christmas Day Look At Santa's Tax Bill
